name: Greedy Goblin (itch) (Ev1lbl0w)
description:
You're a goblin that likes all things shiny, coin or gems! Explore the level and collect as much as you can find, defending from enemies everywhere!

Project made as a "Quest" for GameDev Técnico.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Move around (S/Down Arrow to drop-down platforms)
  • E: Attack
  • Space: Jump
  • Escape: Leave level
